# IKnxAddress.IsIndividualAddress method

Checks if an address is a [`GroupAddress`](../../Tiveria.Home.Knx.Primitives/GroupAddress.md) or a [`IndividualAddress`](../../Tiveria.Home.Knx.Primitives/IndividualAddress.md)

```csharp
public bool IsIndividualAddress()
```

## Return Value

True in case of a [`IndividualAddress`](../../Tiveria.Home.Knx.Primitives/IndividualAddress.md)
